data.text:
@_Rian_Stone @redpilldadpua @AusDaygame @DexterDaygame That's fair.

All the lockdown stuff I hear coming out of Canada and the UK sounds absolutely wild to me.

@redpilldadpua To be clear these covid vaccines are a net positive. Especially for vulnerable people. 

All im saying is I want to wait a year or two before getting it so the side effects are resolved.

@_Rian_Stone @redpilldadpua @AusDaygame @DexterDaygame I can appreciate both perspectives. My mother is in the high risk population due to her medical conditions. I'm glad she got her shots. I haven't had any shots since I was in the military. As I age, I'll reconsider. Would like to see more data on these new ones, though.
@_Rian_Stone @redpilldadpua @AusDaygame @DexterDaygame From what I gather, the trials were....abbreviated. Your concern is def not without merit.
@_Rian_Stone @redpilldadpua @AusDaygame @DexterDaygame mRNA vaccines & other applications have been studied for at least a decade. It's not like they thought of this stuff a year ago.
